Galio confirmed female.

>why do you think he's so big? He needs to overcompensate

Cause and effect, my friend. He suffers from the condition known as /mīˈkrä'pen'iz/ because he's clearly a substance abuser. Frankly, that stature is impossible without some form of physical and hormonal enhancement medicine.

(I could not for the life of me find this clip in any quality better than this; which is some of the worst video and audio quality I've ever witnessed)
Me >:(

I hate his new smile.
Since when do Gargoyle statues smile?....
Since they become alive. He's happy that he's alive because he's dormant for 99% of his lifespan

but but, look at that smile
that's such a troll smile!!!!

other than that, his new skill set seems interesting and i'd like to give him a try when he comes to live
STILL, THAT SMILE!!!
He's smiling because he knows he gon fuk some shit up :D

Have you never watched "The Hunchback of Notre Dame"? Lots of smiling gargoyles there. 

They also sing.
when i was like 7-9, all i remember is that there was a french guy that had something on his back which forced him to bend over
Please type "smiling gargoyle" to google image search and you will see some pretty smiles on many ugly faces. :)

thank you for your advice, but, i don't really like "gargoyles", so, i'll definitely not google that
however, thx for telling me is kind of normal

Haldo!
Not to mention that he just turned farmland into a hole in the ground. Now we know why Demacia had a famine. Galio woke up and stepped on all the crops.

Just another example of Demacian "justice". AKA oppression and fascism. The Demacian monarchy is repressing their people and sending giant animated statues to beat them into submission!

And people still get mad at Noxus for trying to help those poor souls overthrow their tyrannical overlords...
at least in demacia your country won't condone murdering you unless someone else was going to anyway.
Survival of the fittest, man. Noxus is simply encouraging the continued growth and development of the human species.
Nah, there are too many Noxians to truly believe that. Noxus just has no other choice, but to go to war due to their enormous population.

Exactly! Survival of the fittest takes too long to produce results in a peaceful societ, so Noxus goes to war to rapidly increase the speed of natural selection! As well as wipe out the other, weaker humans in other nations in order to make sure only the best and strongest can survive and reproduce.

 Noxus is paving the way for humanity’s future!

gg report shitcan galio friendly fire damage teamtowers gg
Haha. I think he is pretty cool know :D (not because he destroyed your house and family but still)
GALIO NO STAP!

YOOOOO, You probably are getting a lot of shit about this. But I SEriously hate you for throwing Galio away and replacing him with the champ you are now calling Galio. Honestly a MAJOR MAJOR MAJOR BUMMER. I will miss galio forever. and his Hextech skin i had was my favorite and now he, this new atrox/ sion piece of shit you are calling galio isnt galio. I'm sorry but this is truly upsetting. THIS WAS NOT A rework. This ISNT GALIO. not ever close to the same champ. you deserve my honest opinion, and need to know how SAD I AM. eeewwwhhh. i Truly know nothing cam be done about it, because you made the choice to throw away a really FUN champ. especially in season 6-7 i have been having a blast. I HAVE NO interest in the new champ now named Galio. he doesnt even fly anymore, fuck you RIOT! i don't want to get into trouble sending this but I wanted you to know how SUCKY this is for people who actually liked galio....

I like the new Galio, and I liked the old one. But you have a point there, the old Galio is lost forever and nothing can be done about this. The two Galios should be two different champs since they are both really cool...
